lsr.player_config.spectating: Ye'll be watchin' the game from the crow's nest
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.title: The Ghostly Phantom
lsr.boogeyman.choose.the_boogeyman.descr: Ye be the Ghostly Phantom, cursed to roam the seas! To lift yer curse, ye must, by any means necessary, send an %1$s or %2$s name to the Kraken with yer own hands! Fail, and ye’ll become a %3$s name in the next tide. No alliances nor friendships will save ye, for when ye be the Ghostly Phantom, ye sail alone!
If ye don't be cured o' the curse after sendin' a soul to the locker, be sure to notify a Warlord, ya
lsr.boogeyman.choose.not_the_boogeyman.d: Ye be NOT the Ghostly Phantom! The Ghostly Phantom must, by any means, send an %1$s or %2$s name to the Kraken with 'heir own hands to lift the curse. All loyalties and friendships be stripped away while they sail as the Phantom. Beware o' all, for none can be trusted!
lsr.boogeyman.cure: Ye be cured, free from the curse of the Ghostly Phantom!
lsr.session.start: The tide be startin'! Good luck, ye brave soul! May the winds be at yer back and yer cutlass sharp!
lsr.boogeyman.punish.description.p1: Ye failed to claim an %1$s or %2$s name last session as the Ghostly Phantom! As punishment, ye've dropped to yer %3$s. All alliances be shattered, and ye are now hostile to all players on the seas. If ye dare, ye may join forces with others on their Last Life, but trust no one, for betrayal be always afoot
lsr.menu.credits.title: Credits
lsr.menu.pack.title: Series o' Life Reborn
lsr.menu.button.return_to_main_menu: Set Sail for the Main Deck
lsr.menu.button.start_game: Hoist the Jolly Roger and Set Sail!
lsr.menu.button.reset_all_settings: Return all settings to their original course!
lsr.misc.last_life.p1: Ye’ve dropped to yer %s! All alliances be cut, and ye are now a threat to all players. Ye may choose to team up with others on their Last Life if ye wish, but trust no one, for betrayal be as certain as the tide!
lsr.util.check_operator_status.p2: Run %s to chart a course for the Main Deck!
lsr.misc.eliminated.title: Ye've been sent to the Kraken... forever...
lsr.boogeyman.cure.not_enough_players: Ye've been cured, for there be no soul left to claim!
lsr.menu.credits.developers.title: Emperors
lsr.menu.credits.testers.title: Pirates
